title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, April 11, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Dorothy Allison (1949), the novelist and memoirist who said, “The thing I’m telling you is true, but it did not always happen to me.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Dorothy Allison (1949), the novelist and memoirist who said, “The thing I’m telling you is true, but it did not always happen to me.”
